guide.conclusion: Minimal setup is plug-in-play, but requires a Linux computer. If you want more - activities may require cross-compilation, C and JavaScript programming and building circuits.

guide.summary: Flexibity Open Sensors Toolkit is an Open Source Internet connected platform for wireless home and environmental monitoring. You just install our application on a router, connect radio to USB port, turn on sensors and you personal sensor network is ready!
